info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued July 22 at 6:37AM CDT until July 22 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Huntsville AL
info.description:
* WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility drops to 1/4 of a mile or less in dense fog. For the Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 101.
* WHERE...Franklin TN County.
* WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 8 AM CDT this morning. For the Heat Advisory, until 9 PM CDT this evening.
* IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat illnesses. Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction:
Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.
To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

parameter.value: DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING
